医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了 mGluR1 在修剪早期神经连接中的作用并非大脑中的所有东西都能持久。当我们的大脑组装时，必须在正确的时间和地点建立或拆除数万亿个神经连接。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-uncovers-the-role-of-mGluR1-in-pruning-early-neural-connections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-uncovers-the-role-of-mGluR1-in-pruning-early-neural-connections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9367216-75f0-42d4-b293-e65c1a39da80 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 09:53:41 -0400 Study uncovers the role of mGluR1 in pruning early neural connections
研究表明热处理具有促进健康老龄化的潜力对老鼠进行的新研究表明，每天在桑拿等温暖的环境中可能有助于老年人，尤其是女性，对抗与年龄相关的肥胖和胰岛素抵抗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-shows-the-pottial-of-heat-treatments-to-promote-healthier-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-shows-the-pottial-of-heat-treatments-to-promote-healthier-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5065a12b-b5b4-46e7-b251-200d9e2d7b4b Mon, 01 Jul 2024 09:45:54 -0400 Study shows the potential of heat treatments to promote healthier aging
研究为治疗默克尔细胞癌患者的新型免疫疗法铺平了道路科学家们在实验室实验中证明了一种新型免疫疗法的显着效果，该疗法来自患有侵袭性皮肤癌（默克尔细胞癌）的患者的细胞样本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Research-paves-way-for-new-forms-of-immunotherapy-to-treat-people-with-Merkel-cell-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Research-paves-way-for-new-forms-of-immunotherapy-to-treat-people-with-Merkel-cell-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9605a4a-091e-4748-8c81-d25efcf8042c Mon, 01 Jul 2024 09:41:00 -0400 Research paves way for new forms of immunotherapy to treat people with Merkel cell cancer
带有隐藏武器的纳米机器人可用于精准癌症治疗瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员开发出了能够杀死小鼠癌细胞的纳米机器人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Nanorobots-with-hidden-weapons-for- precision-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Nanorobots-with-hidden-weapons-for- precision-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b597c53-5bbf-4ebc-bf58-4f04934cc907 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 09:35:31 -0400 Nanorobots with hidden weapons for precision cancer therapy
研究为理解抗生素耐药性如何传播提供了新线索瑞典于默奥大学的一项研究为了解抗生素耐药性如何传播提供了新线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-provides-new-clues-in-the-understanding-of-how-antibiotic-resistance-spreads.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-provides-new-clues-in-the-understanding-of-how-antibiotic-resistance-spreads.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7fd4183-32a2-42a2-b707-1adb00948455 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 09:30:40 -0400 Study provides new clues in the understanding of how antibiotic resistance spreads
人工智能模型增加了通过糖分析检测癌症的潜力哥德堡大学的研究人员开发了一种人工智能模型，可以提高通过糖分析检测癌症的潜力https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/AI-model-increases-the-pottial-for-detecting-cancer-through-sugar-analysiss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/AI-model-increases-the-pottial-for-detecting-cancer-through-sugar-analysiss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adeae721-7e8b-42f1-9397-4b4bdad8569d Mon, 01 Jul 2024 09:00:54 -0400 AI model increases the potential for detecting cancer through sugar analyses
Radiometer 和 Etiometry 宣布建立商业合作伙伴关系，通过优化高危护理环境中的工作流程和决策来增强医生的能力专门从事急症护理测试解决方案的领先医疗设备公司 Radiometer 和重症监护临床决策支持软件领域的领导者 Etiometry 今天宣布建立新的商业合作伙伴关系，以增强医院环境中的临床决策和工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Radiometer-and-Etiometry-announce-commercial-partnership-to-empower-physicals-by-optimizing-workflows-and-decision-making-in-high-视力护理设置.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Radiometer-and-Etiometry-announce-commercial-partnership-to-empower-physicals-by-optimizing-workflows-and-decision-making-in-high- acuity-care-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07760bef-05f1-4262-9e91-1e4cbf6dcd03 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 08:49:00 -0400 Radiometer and Etiometry announce commercial partnership to empower physicians by optimizing workflows and decision making in high acuity care settings
研究人员开发出先进方法来分析血液中 DNA 片段的液体活检肿瘤学家使用活检和成像技术来诊断和监测肿瘤疾病并评估治疗成功。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Researchers-develop-advanced-method-to-analyze-liquid-biopsies-of-DNA-fragments-in-the-blood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Researchers-develop-advanced-method-to-analyze-liquid-biopsies-of-DNA-fragments-in-the-blood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4847b4ee-87b9-4f82-aa0e-23f82321df22 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 08:44:00 -0400 Researchers develop advanced method to analyze liquid biopsies of DNA fragments in the blood
Radiometer 庆祝急性护理诊断领域成立 70 周年1954年，Radiometer推出了世界上第一台商用血气分析仪。这一事件促使一家为无线电行业生产设备的丹麦小公司进军急症护理诊断领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Radiometer-celebrates-70-years-in-acute-care-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Radiometer-celebrates-70-years-in-acute-care-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=362555ec-2c84-4a5e-ab35-f67223fc452b Mon, 01 Jul 2024 08:44:00 -0400 Radiometer celebrates 70 years in acute care diagnostics
挑战成瘾的慢性脑部疾病模型一项广泛的研究综述表明，成瘾不仅仅是一种慢性脑部疾病，将其视为一种慢性脑部疾病可能会限制治疗选择并增加耻辱感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Challenging-the-chronic-brain-disease-model-of-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Challenging-the-chronic-brain-disease-model-of-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=222acceb-88f7-4a36-9f63-100feac105ca Mon, 01 Jul 2024 08:22:35 -0400 Challenging the chronic brain disease model of addiction
